```{r}
#pdb <- read.pdb("6u2f.pdb")

hits <- NULL
hits$pdb.id <- c('6U2F','2QTW','2XTJ')

files <- get.pdb(hits$pdb.id, path="pdbs", split=TRUE, gzip=TRUE)

pdbs <- pdbaln(files, fit = TRUE)
```
